data.title: James Pearce-smith
data.text:
Western Circuit • Regional Bar

Agriculture

LEADING JUNIORS1

James Pearce-Smith – St John’s Chambers 'James gives very clear advice and this is mirrored in his polite but effective advocacy. He always has a strong grasp of the facts and applicable law.'

Western Circuit • Regional Bar

Commercial litigation

LEADING JUNIORS1

James Pearce-Smith – St John’s Chambers ‘He is very user-friendly, knowledgeable, calm, flexible and overall a pleasure to work with.’

Western Circuit • Regional Bar

Professional negligence

LEADING JUNIORS1

James Pearce-Smith – St John’s Chambers ‘James is a fantastic advocate. His approach to cross-examination is particularly impressive in that he comes across at first as extremely polite and courteous, which lulls witnesses into a false sense of security, and he then sets about pulling their testimony methodically apart.’
